nap.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a short sleep, especially during the day
nap.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: I usually take a nap after lunch.
nap.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: the soft surface on some cloth and leather, made by brushing the short fine threads or hairs in one direction
nap.translation[0].note_box[0].sections[: I took a nap after lunch.
A short nap may make you feel better.
I like to have a brief nap in the afternoon.
She has her afternoon nap at about two.
At age four, she was still having a two-hour nap every day.
Try taking a power nap before the meeting.
I envied her ability to take catnaps at any time of the day.
You can always tell when it's a baby's nap time because they start getting irritable.
nap.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to sleep for a short time during the day
